item.title: Rails 2.3 Application Template template.rb
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: Here’s my current Rails 2.3 application template which uses the following features: asset_packager exception_notifier paperclip restful-authentication (generates user and session) role-requirement (generates roles for user) rspec cucumber active_merchant sqlite3-ruby will_paginate haml nifty_layout Capistrano capify database session store `Here’s my current Rails 2.3 application template which uses the following features: asset_packager exception_notifier paperclip restful-authentication (generates user and session) role-requirement (generates roles for user) rspec cucumber active_merchant sqlite3-ruby will_paginate haml nifty_layout Capistrano capify database session store `
